name: Blu (DaxInvader)
description:
Blu has lost someone important to them. Follow Blu on an adventure to relive the story and legacy of their predecessor...

!!! Important Bug Fix !!!

When you interact pick up a torn pages from Blu Room, please ONLY PRESS E ONCE.

Otherwise you might skip a level.
